TEST_NAME: DAs should avoid Lose Focus or Get Focus triggering events
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapd as (select case
                     when WHEN_EVENT_NAME in ('Lose Focus','Get Focus') then 'N' 
                     else 'Y'
                     end pass_yn,
                     application_id,
                     page_id,
                     dynamic_action_id,
                     dynamic_action_name,
                     last_updated_by,
                     last_updated_on,
                     build_option,
							       workspace
            from apex_application_page_da
 )
 select aapd.pass_yn,                          
       aapd.application_id, 
       aapd.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapd.last_updated_by,
       aapd.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Dynamic Action `%0` (app %1, page %2) uses a get/lose focus dynamic action. This should be avoided for accessibility.', 
        p0 => aapd.dynamic_action_name, 
        p1 => aapd.application_id,
        p2 => aapd.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Dynamic Action `%0` (app %1, page %2) uses a get/lose focus dynamic action', 
        p0 => aapd.dynamic_action_name, 
        p1 => aapd.application_id,
        p2 => aapd.page_id) issue_title,
       aapd.dynamic_action_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapd.dynamic_action_name,
			 aapd.workspace
from aapd
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapd.page_id and aap.application_id = aapd.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapd.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapd.application_id
where aapd.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION:
This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :
  1. 2.1.2(A) : No Keyboard Trap: If keyboard focus can be moved to a component of the page using a keyboard interface, then focus can be moved away from that component using only a keyboard interface, and, if it requires more than unmodified arrow or tab keys or other standard exit methods, the user is advised of the method for moving focus away.
